reviews.review_msg: I have never written a review but I have decided to write one for Professor Meyer today. She is perhaps the finest professor SFU has to offer, she is extremely friendly and knowledgeable. If you have the chance to take a class with her, don't think twice, just take it!

I took a class with Professor Meyer and for someone who seems very seasoned as a professor, her organization of this class is very poor. Her 1 hr lecture is so dry, and it is extremely difficult to filter and decide what is actually important. The remaining 2 hours is listening to your peers discuss the readings. She doesn't do a very good job of d

A nice lady but her "lectures"(1 hr) are so dry and uninformative.  The rest of the 2.5 hours involve you listening to your peers regurgitate the articles they may or may not have understood.  She is a bit tough on the mid-term and especially the papers.  Overall the course could have been a lot better.
She was pretty chill. Marking scheme was fair, easy going. Easily recommended.

A high quality prof who really knows her stuff. Being travelled to China and knew a lot about it. Though she does criticize, but always in an neutral perspective. I found this prof very interesting and engaging. Looking forward to take more of her classes in the future :)
Good Prof! Take her class, she knows her stuff and communicates it well.
Hallelujah my saviour!!! brought my GPA up and was such a kind and caring person compared to the other garbage profs I've had. I highly recommend her :)
easy exams.  informative and she'll make u interested in what u r studying.
